execution_plan.description: Get all users from the main application database (app) with their id, username and email.
execution_plan.query: SELECT id, username, email FROM users;

execution_plan.description: Get number of distinct chats each chat user participates in from the chat database (app_chat). Returns chat user id, username and chat_count.
execution_plan.query: SELECT u.id AS chat_user_id, u.username AS username, COUNT(DISTINCT cm.chat_id) AS chat_count FROM users u JOIN chat_members cm ON u.id = cm.user_id GROUP BY u.id, u.username;
